Create a children's book about a tiger who is afraid of mice but learns to overcome his fear through bravery and determination.
Develop an interactive game for mobile devices where players take on the role of the tiger and must navigate through different levels filled with mice in order to progress.
Create a series of short videos or animations featuring the tiger as he faces his fear of mice and overcomes it one step at a time.
Design a set of coloring pages or activity sheets featuring the tiger and other animals who are afraid of different things, such as spiders or heights.
Host a virtual event or webinar where experts in psychology or child development share tips and strategies for helping children overcome their fears.
